DOC.detailed_description: This prospective randomize interventional study do Obstetrics Gynecology Department , Benha University Hospital , Alkalubia , Egypt August 2013 August 2015 . The study protocol approve Local Ethics Committee write informed consent take patient enter study . The study include 100 woman age 18-35 year singleton pregnancy 28-36 week gestation , diagnose isolated oligohydramnios ( AFI le 5 cm ) . Initially , participant subject routine antenatal history take examination routine ultrasound scan use ( Voluson , 730 Pro V , GE Medical System ) , AFI assess . All participant instruct take regularly daily water requirement , especially two day start study throughout study . Participants randomly schedule two equal group computer-generated block control group receive placebo vaginal tablet study group receive 20 mg isosorbide mononitrate ( IMN ) vaginally daily delivery ( Effox , Mina Pharma Co , Egypt ; license Schwartz Pharma , Germany ) . Treatment allocation conceal use sequentially number opaque seal envelope , open sequentially third person ( study nurse ) . Amniotic fluid index rechecked two day follow weekly till delivery one person avoid interobserver variability . Drug treatment continue volume fluid reach normal value delivery . Antenatal vitamin continue . Primary outcome measure change AFI . Secondary outcome measure side effect isosorbide mononitrate , indication mode delivery , neonatal outcomes regard birth weight , still birth neonatal death , Apgar score need neonatal admission .
